channel.title: CVE Feed for Brainstorm Force -- Spectra
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brainstorm Force -- Spectra

item.title: CVE-2023-23730|2024-06-03T21:24:35.797Z -- Brainstorm Force -- Spectra
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in Brainstorm Force Spectra allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Spectra: from n/a through 2.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-23735|2024-06-03T21:26:09.020Z -- Brainstorm Force -- Spectra
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in Brainstorm Force Spectra allows Code Injection.This issue affects Spectra: from n/a through 2.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-23738|2024-06-03T21:33:35.646Z -- Brainstorm Force -- Spectra
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection') vulnerability in Brainstorm Force Spectra allows Content Spoofing, Phishing.This issue affects Spectra: from n/a through 2.3.0.
